body:
On Xbox if you haven't logged into your account in five years, you lose the gamertag, freeing it up for someone else to use. 

There should be a similar feature here for accounts that have been abandoned.
body_html:
On Xbox if you haven't logged into your account in five years, you lose the gamertag, freeing it up for someone else to use.

There should be a similar feature here for accounts that have been abandoned.
title: Username changes

guild.description:
This used to be a place to share, view, and track feedback for Ruqqus. Now it's pretty useless because the admins don't care. Try buttering them up on discord. They don't respond here. 

+ruqqusbugs

body:
I'm not sure about that. There's always the possibility that someone will come back.

And it'll be confusing to people who knew that user in the past.
